films.title: Black Panther
films.description: Black Panther follows T'Challa as he defends Wakanda from a vengeful foe, blending action with cultural and social themes.

films.title: Manos: The Hands Of Fate
films.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden cult.
